title: How to Delete or Cancel Facebook Events You Created

steps.title: Tap the hamburger menu icon.
steps.content: Tap the hamburger menu icon. This is located in the bottom right of the mobile app on an iPhone or iPad, and at the top-right on an Android. It looks like three horizontal lines stacked on each other. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Events.
steps.content: Tap Events . You might need to tap See More on your version of the app.

steps.title: Tap Your Events.
steps.content: Tap Your Events . This will open a list of events you're hosting. Look for the one you want to delete.

steps.title: Tap Edit.
steps.content: Tap Edit . This will open a menu with a few event options.

steps.title: Tap Delete Event.
steps.content: Tap Delete Event . This will start the deletion process. Alternatively, tap Cancel Event to start a cancellation process. This allows users to continue to post on the event page.

steps.title: Tap Confirm.
steps.content: Tap Confirm . The event is now deleted (or canceled, if you chose that option). When an event is deleted, users can no longer post on the event. A notification will be sent to individuals who were invited and didn’t decline.

steps.title: Click Events in the left menu of your Feed.
steps.content: Click Events in the left menu of your Feed. If you don't see it, click See More first. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click Your Events in the left panel.
steps.content: Click Your Events in the left panel. Select Hosting , and then choose the name of your event to open the event page.

steps.title: Click the More ••• menu.
steps.content: Click the More ••• menu. This will open an options menu for the event. On the window that appears, you'll have two options: Cancel Event: This option marks the event as Canceled and notifies all guests of the change. You can type a message to provide info about the cancellation to your guests. This event will still be accessible in your calendar, but not as an active event. Delete Event: This option completely deletes the event from Facebook, removing it from all attendees' calendars.

steps.title: Select Delete Event.
steps.content: Select Delete Event . This will start the deletion process. Alternatively, tap Cancel Event to start a cancellation process. This allows users to continue to post on the event page.

steps.title: Click Confirm to save your changes.
steps.content: Click Confirm to save your changes. Once you confirm, the event will be canceled or deleted immediately.
